short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search in your open tabs, bookmark links and even your history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever been in the situation when you wanted to search for opened tab within your chrome windows or you have visited the website once but now you don't know where it is? Then this plugin is for you. 

With the help of this plugin you can search for a link in your open tabs, saved bookmarks and even your browser history.
You can search by page title, or a URL/link.

How to use it?

We have provided you the browsemate search in your browser address bar or you can use this feature through a popup window, by pressing an icon on your browse right top corner.

Address Bar: 

Type "bm <search criteria>" in your address bar and it will show you all matching links.

Popup Windows: 

Click on browsemate icon, present next to your address bar, and and type your search criteria. You can even use arrow keys.
